name: Ragnahawk

aura.name: flame_wing
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Fire damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description: Some think it is a related species to Beakon, but there is in fact no connection. It mainly eats rocks, and after many long years its beak and head have hardened to accommodate this diet.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: spirit_fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: flare_arrow
skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

skills.name: sand_tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: flare_storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: ignis_breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: fire_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.
